title: Religious structures existing prior to rehabilitation, if allowed as part of rehabilitation in accordance with the guidelines issued by the Government from time to time, shall not exceed the area that existed prior to rehabilitation
clause_text: Religious structures existing prior to rehabilitation, if allowed as part of rehabilitation in accordance with the guidelines issued by the Government from time to time, shall not exceed the area that existed prior to rehabilitation. However FSI required for the same shall not be counted in the in-situ permissible F.S.I. of slum rehabilitation scheme (S.R.S.).

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
